(actually scourge was able to fix some of the computer. it will still respond 
to quickstrikes commands but it doesn't recognize the predacons loyal to hell 
beast as enemies)

Scourge senses something is wrong with Rage.
Scourge: Do not be frightened. (he points to the base) It will not harm you. 
It only harms those that it recognizes as enemies. And if you need anything 
just say so.
Tankoor arrives at the base.
